verses.verse: And <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1323>her<s%>, My daughter, shall I not <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4494>rest<s%> for <S%H3190>thee<s%>, that it may be well with thee?

And now is not <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> our <S%H4130>kinsman<s%>, with whose <S%H5291>maidens<s%> thou <S%H2219>wast<s%>? Behold, he winnoweth <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H3915>to-night<s%> in the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>.

Wash <S%H7364><s%> thyself <S%H5480>therefore<s%>, and anoint <S%H7760>thee<s%>, and put thy <S%H8071>raiment<s%> upon <S%H3381>thee<s%>, and get thee down to the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>, but make not thyself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto the <S%H376>man<s%>, until he shall have <S%H3615>done<s%> <S%H398>eating<s%> and <S%H8354>drinking<s%>.

And it shall <S%H7901>be<s%>, when he lieth down, that thou shalt <S%H3045>mark<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall <S%H7901>lie<s%>, and thou shalt go <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H1540>uncover<s%> his <S%H4772>feet<s%>, and lay thee <S%H7901>down<s%>; and he will <S%H5046>tell<s%> thee what thou shalt <S%H6213>do<s%>.
And she <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H559>her<s%>, All that thou sayest I will <S%H6213>do<s%>.
And she went <S%H3381>down<s%> unto the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>, and <S%H6213>did<s%> according to all that her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law bade <S%H6680>her<s%>.

And when <S%H1162>Boaz<s%> had <S%H398>eaten<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%>, and his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H3190>merry<s%>, he <S%H935>went<s%> to lie <S%H7901>down<s%> at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the heap of <S%H6194>grain<s%>: and she <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H3909>softly<s%>, and <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H4772>feet<s%>, and laid her <S%H7901>down<s%>.

And it came to pass at <S%H2677>midnight<s%>, that the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H2729>afraid<s%>, and <S%H3943>turned<s%> <S%H802>himself<s%>; and, behold, a woman <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Who art <S%H559>thou<s%>? And she answered, I am <S%H7327>Ruth<s%> thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>: <S%H6566>spread<s%> therefore thy <S%H3671>skirt<s%> over thy <S%H519>handmaid<s%>; for thou art a near <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be thou of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>: thou hast <S%H3190>showed<s%> more <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in the latter <S%H314>end<s%> than at the <S%H7223>beginning<s%>, inasmuch as thou <S%H3212>followedst<s%> <S%H1115>not<s%> young <S%H970>men<s%>, whether <S%H1800>poor<s%> or <S%H6223>rich<s%>.

And <S%H1323>now<s%>, my daughter, <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H6213>not<s%>; I will do to thee all that thou <S%H559>sayest<s%>; for all the <S%H8179>city<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> doth <S%H3045>know<s%> that thou art a <S%H2428>worthy<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%>.
And now it is <S%H551>true<s%> that I am a near <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>; howbeit there <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> nearer than <S%H7138>I<s%>.

Tarry <S%H3885><s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%>, and it shall be in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, that if he will perform unto thee the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>, <S%H2896>well<s%>; let him do the <S%H1350>kinsman<s%>'s part: but if he <S%H2654>will<s%> not do the part of a <S%H1350>kinsman<s%> to <S%H1350>thee<s%>, then will I do the part of a kinsman to <S%H3068>thee<s%>, as Jehovah <S%H2416>liveth<s%>: lie <S%H7901>down<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>.

And she <S%H7901>lay<s%> at his <S%H4772>feet<s%> until the <S%H1242>morning<s%>. And she rose <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H2958>before<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> could <S%H5234>discern<s%> <S%H7453>another<s%>. For he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let it not be <S%H3045>known<s%> that the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1637>threshing-floor<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3051>Bring<s%> the <S%H4304>mantle<s%> that is upon <S%H270>thee<s%>, and hold <S%H270>it<s%>; and she held <S%H4058>it<s%>; and he measured <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley<s%>, and <S%H7896>laid<s%> it on <S%H935>her<s%>: and he went into the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And when she <S%H935>came<s%> to her <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law, she <S%H559>said<s%>, Who art <S%H1323>thou<s%>, my daughter? And she <S%H559>told<s%> her all that the <S%H376>man<s%> had done to <S%H6213>her<s%>.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, These <S%H8337>six<s%> measures of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> he <S%H559>me<s%>; for he said, <S%H935>Go<s%> not <S%H7387>empty<s%> unto thy <S%H2545>mother-in<s%>-law.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3427>she<s%>, Sit still, my <S%H1323>daughter<s%>, until thou <S%H3045>know<s%> how the <S%H1697>matter<s%> will <S%H5307>fall<s%>; for the <S%H376>man<s%> will not <S%H8252>rest<s%>, <S%H518>until<s%> he have <S%H3615>finished<s%> the <S%H1697>thing<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
